mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select post_id, board_id, title, level, cont, emp_id, reg_dt, able, pa_post_id, gn from post start with pa_post_id is null connect by prior post_id = pa_post_id order siblings by gn desc, post_id)a where board_id = #{board_id})a where a.rn between (#{pagesize} * (#{page} - 1)) + 1 and (#{pagesize} * #{page})
mapper.insert: insert into post(post_id, title, cont, reg_dt, able, emp_id, board_id, gn) values(#{post_id}, #{title}, #{cont}, sysdate, 'F', #{emp_id}, #{board_id}, #{gn})
insert into post(post_id, board_id, title, cont, emp_id, reg_dt, able, pa_post_id, gn) values(#{post_id}, #{board_id}, #{title}, #{cont}, #{emp_id}, sysdate, 'F', #{pa_post_id}, #{gn})
mapper.update: update post set able=#{able} where post_id=#{pa_post_id}
update post set title=#{title}, cont=#{cont}, reg_dt=sysdate where post_id=#{pa_post_id}
